title: Fiore's Italian Bakery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Take-out, Bakery, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This cozy and funky cafe offers plenty of vegan food, clearly labeled. Food includes cookies, cupcakes, sandwiches, salads, smoothies, pizza by the slice, and more. Has non-dairy milk for coffee. Try the peanut butter ball dipped in chocolate or the vegan whoopie pie. You could also order custom vegan cakes. An ever-changing array of art lines the walls. Look for the green awning and yellow letters sign. Established since 2001.
